urls.title: Three decades and ready for the future: the OSCE‚Äôs human rights office marks its 30th anniversary
urls.description: WARSAW/STOCKHOLM, 14 October 2021 ‚Äì Thirty years ago, the OSCE Office for Democratic Institutions and Human Rights (ODIHR) was established. Its mandate is to assist the countries of the OSCE region in strengthening democratic institutions and the rule of law, and in respecting¬† human rights.
